model_desc: this model uses a stochastic weather generator to create a timeseries based on user-specified avg and var precip. credit to scott, casey, and austin. (?)

userid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

runid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

basinid.description: NHDplus featureid or name of preset basin (i.e. west_brook

rscript.description: Name of the script that this config file is for. Always required, to be included in all config files.

pre_run.description: Can be a single run or multiple runs (i.e. fish model needs both stream flow and temp inputs).

preset_basin.description: Can be west brook or null.  Eventually, add a few more preset options?

change_precip_mean.description: Change in percentage (as 0-100%). need to divide by 100.

change_precip_var.description: Change in percentage (as 0-100%). need to divide by 100.

nyears.description: Number of years for simulation to run.

wet_threshold.description: In mm/day. Minimum threshold of daily precip for a day to be considered a wet day.

met_dir.description: The directory where gridded meterological data is stored.  Within this dir, files are names by lat & long.
